TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FeedOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies the options associated with feed methods (enumeration operations) in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.remarks: Used to manage query and ReadFeed execution. Can use FeedOptions to set page size (MaxItemCount)

MemberSignature.Value: public bool DisableRUPerMinuteUsage { get; set; }
.property instance bool DisableRUPerMinuteUsage
Public Property DisableRUPerMinuteUsage As Boolean
member this.DisableRUPerMinuteUsage : bool with get, set
public: property bool DisableRUPerMinuteUsage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool DisableRUPerMinuteUsage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the option for the current query in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

remarks.para: DisableRUPerMinuteUsage is used to enable/disable Request Units(RUs)/minute capacity to serve the query if regular provisioned RUs/second is exhausted.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnableCrossPartitionQuery { get; set; }
.property instance bool EnableCrossPartitionQuery
Public Property EnableCrossPartitionQuery As Boolean
member this.EnableCrossPartitionQuery : bool with get, set
public: property bool EnableCrossPartitionQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool EnableCrossPartitionQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users are enabled to send more than one request to execute the query in the Azure Cosmos DB service. More than one request is necessary if the query is not scoped to single partition key value.
Docs.value: Option is true if cross-partition query execution is enabled; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: This option only applies to queries on documents and document attachments.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the option to enable low precision order by in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The option to enable low-precision order by.

MemberSignature.Value: public Nullable<bool> EnableScanInQuery { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the option to enable scans on the queries which couldn't be served as indexing was opted out on the requested paths in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: Option is true if scan on queries is enabled; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxBufferedItemCount { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxBufferedItemCount
Public Property MaxBufferedItemCount As Integer
member this.MaxBufferedItemCount : int with get, set
public: property int MaxBufferedItemCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int MaxBufferedItemCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items that can be buffered client side during parallel query execution in the Azure Cosmos DB service. A positive property value limits the number of buffered items to the set value. If it is set to less than 0, the system automatically decides the number of items to buffer.
Docs.value: The maximum count of items that can be buffered during parallel query execution.
Docs.remarks: This is only suggestive and cannot be abided by in certain cases.

example.code: var queryable = client.CreateDocumentQuery<Book>(collectionLink, new FeedOptions { MaximumBufferSize = 10, MaxDegreeOfParallelism = 2 });

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxDegreeOfParallelism { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxDegreeOfParallelism
Public Property MaxDegreeOfParallelism As Integer
member this.MaxDegreeOfParallelism : int with get, set
public: property int MaxDegreeOfParallelism { int get(); void set(int value); };
public: property int MaxDegreeOfParallelism { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of concurrent operations run client side during parallel query execution in the Azure Cosmos DB service. A positive property value limits the number of concurrent operations to the set value. If it is set to less than 0, the system automatically decides the number of concurrent operations to run.
Docs.value: The maximum number of concurrent operations during parallel execution. Defaults to 0.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to be returned in the enumeration operation in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The maximum number of items to be returned in the enumeration operation.
Docs.remarks: Used for query pagination. '-1' Used for dynamic page size.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Azure.Documents.PartitionKey PartitionKey { get; set; }
.property instance class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.PartitionKey PartitionKey
Public Property PartitionKey As PartitionKey
member this.PartitionKey : Microsoft.Azure.Documents.PartitionKey with get, set
public: property Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ PartitionKey { Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ value); };
public: property Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ PartitionKey { Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Azure::Documents::PartitionKey ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the for the current request in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

remarks.para: Partition key is required when read documents or attachments feed in a partitioned collection. Specifically Partition key is required for : , and . Only documents in partitions containing the is returned in the result.

Docs.example:
The following example shows how to read a document feed in a partitioned collection using . The example assumes the collection is created with a on the 'country' property in all the documents.
await client.ReadDocumentFeedAsync( collection.SelfLink, new RequestOptions { PartitionKey = new PartitionKey("USA") } );

MemberSignature.Value: public string PartitionKeyRangeId { get; set; }
.property instance string PartitionKeyRangeId
Public Property PartitionKeyRangeId As String
member this.PartitionKeyRangeId : string with get, set
public: property System::String ^ PartitionKeyRangeId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
public: property Platform::String ^ PartitionKeyRangeId { Platform::String ^ get(); void set(Platform::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the partition key range id for the current request.

remarks.para: ReadFeed requests can use this to forward request to specific range. This is usefull in case of bulk export scenarios.

Docs.example:
The following example shows how to read a document feed in a partitioned collection from partition key range "20".
await client.ReadDocumentFeedAsync( collection.SelfLink, new RequestOptions { PartitionKeyRangeId = "20" } );

MemberSignature.Value: public bool PopulateQueryMetrics { get; set; }
.property instance bool PopulateQueryMetrics
Public Property PopulateQueryMetrics As Boolean
member this.PopulateQueryMetrics : bool with get, set
public: property bool PopulateQueryMetrics { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property bool PopulateQueryMetrics { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the request option for document query requests in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

remarks.para: PopulateQueryMetrics is used to enable/disable getting metrics relating to query execution on document query requests.

MemberSignature.Value: public string RequestContinuation { get; set; }
.property instance string RequestContinuation
Public Property RequestContinuation As String
member this.RequestContinuation : string with get, set
public: property System::String ^ RequestContinuation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
public: property Platform::String ^ RequestContinuation { Platform::String ^ get(); void set(Platform::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the request continuation token in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

example.code: // Resume query execution using the continuation from the previous query var queryable = client.CreateDocumentQuery<Book>(collectionLink, new FeedOptions { RequestContinuation = prevQuery.ResponseContinuation });

MemberSignature.Value: public Nullable<int> ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb
Public Property ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb As Nullable(Of Integer)
member this.ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb : Nullable<int> with get, set
public: property Nullable<int> ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the request option for document query requests in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

remarks.para: ResponseContinuationTokenLimitInKb is used to limit the length of continuation token in the query response. Valid values are >= 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public string SessionToken { get; set; }
.property instance string SessionToken
Public Property SessionToken As String
member this.SessionToken : string with get, set
public: property System::String ^ SessionToken { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
public: property Platform::String ^ SessionToken { Platform::String ^ get(); void set(Platform::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the session token for use with session consistency in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The session token for use with session consistency.
Docs.remarks: Useful for applications that are load balanced across multiple Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.DocumentClient instances. In this case, round-trip the token from end user to the application and then back to Azure Cosmos DB so that a session can be preserved across servers.

example.code: var queryable = client.CreateDocumentQuery<Book>( collectionLink, new FeedOptions { SessionToken = lastSessionToken });
